item.description:
Hello! It's almost football time! We haven't done a Thursday trivia meetup in awhile so why not now?  Let's all meet on Thursday at Coogan's for Stump! Trivia and the first preseason Patriots game! :D 

Stump! Trivia starts @ 7:00pm, and the Pats game is at 7:30pm.  Come on down and enjoy $2 Bud and Bud Light drafts. 

I should be there by about 6pm or so.  Will try to get a table but this place gets pretty crowded on Thursdays. 

Coogan's is conveniently located near the Blue and Orange lines.  PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER.

I look forward to seeing you!
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture, or just ask the bartenders for me.
item.name: Trivia and Pats Preseason Game!
